response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and value, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500, a significant discount from its market value. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
